text: Allah ekati drstanta upasthapita karachena tadera jan'ya yara abisbasa posana kare, -- nuhera strira o lutera strira. Tara ubhaye chila amadera bandadera madhyera du'ijana satkarmaparayana bandara adhine, kinta tara tamdera prati bisbasaghatakata karechila, phale tamra allah‌ra birud'dhe tadera kono kaje asena ni; ara bala habe -- ''tomara dujane'o prabesakaridera sange agune prabesa karo.’’
